Title: Drugasar Art Series G20 flue gas heater

Title: Valor Balmoral BAL20CH ecolite fire Chrome
Description: Exuding efficiency and charm, Balmoral forms part of Valor’s new Ecolite range of contemporary inset electric fires that is designed to offer the ultimate in electric heating. Complete with a top side switch control, Balmoral is easy to operate and a one piece moulded coalbed and kettle connection also aids installation. For the ultimate in heat and comfort, a concealed 2.0kW fan heater provides a choice of two heat settings and for full visual effect, the flame can be enjoyed independently of the heat. Whilst boasting 100% efficiency, running costs are minimised courtesy of integral ‘Ecolite’ energy efficieny LED lights. To suit everyone’s tastes, Balmoral is available in black, brass and contemporary chrome.
category: Heating/Fires and Surrounds/Fires and Surrounds.csv -> Valor Balmoral BAL20CH ecolite fire Chrome

Title: Valor Savena SAV20CH ecolite fire Brushed Chrome
Description: Designed with energy efficiency and cost-savings in mind, Savena forms part of Valor’s new Ecolite range of contemporary inset electric fires. Named after the fires’ integral energy efficient LED lights that serve to keep running costs low, Savena boasts 100% efficiency and a concealed 2.0kW fan heater that provides a choice of two heat settings. Not only that, for full visual effect, the flame can be enjoyed independently of the heat. Installation is a breeze thanks to a one piece moulded fuelbed and kettle connection, and a top side switch control means operation of the fire couldn’t be easier. Available in black, brass and contemporary brushed chrome, this model offers something for everyone.
